entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
